home.title: LaTeX Quick Trainer
home.subtitle: Master LaTeX mathematical formula writing skills quickly through scientific learning paths and intelligent practice systems
home.quickStartDesc: No registration required, start practicing immediately. Progressive learning path from basic to advanced.
home.realTimePreviewDesc: Preview as you type, see LaTeX formula rendering effects instantly.
home.smartPracticeDesc: Scientific review based on forgetting curve, personalized learning suggestions.
home.experienceNote: Quick experience requires no registration, includes 10 selected practice questions
home.fromBasicToAdvanced: From simple superscripts and subscripts to complex mathematical formulas
home.copyright: ¬© 2024 LaTeX Quick Trainer. Making mathematical formula writing simple.
